user_query: I'm planning a company retreat in Dubai. Can you fetch the details and stories related to the top real estate companies in the UAE? Also, provide us with the historical price chart of the Dubai Financial Market (DFM) index for the past year. Additionally, recommend some luxury hotels and team-building activities in Dubai.

TaskList.description: Fetch details and stories related to the top real estate companies in the UAE.
Retrieve the historical price chart of the Dubai Financial Market (DFM) index for the past year.
Provide recommendations for luxury hotels in Dubai.
Suggest team-building activities available in Dubai.
